generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Fjalla+One");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Noto+Sans:400,400i,700");*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}html{min-height:100%;min-width:320px;font-size:1rem}body{font:400 16px/1.6 Noto Sans,sans-serif;color:#000;display:flex;flex-direction:column;min-height:100vh}main{flex:1;overflow:auto;background-color:#b5f3fc}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5{font-family:Fjalla One,sans-serif;font-weight:800}p{font-size:1rem;margin-bottom:1rem}a{text-decoration:none}a,a:hover{color:#000}a:hover{font-weight:700}cite{font-size:1rem;font-style:italic;display:block;text-align:center}abbr{text-decoration:none}address{font-style:normal}.opacitat{z-index:1;filter:alpha(opacity=70);-moz-opacity:.7;opacity:1}.opacitat:hover{opacity:.7}.sr{position:absolute;height:1px;width:1px;overflow:hidden;clip:rect(1px,1px,1px,1px)}.fil-ariadna ul{display:none}@media (min-width:768px){.fil-ariadna{display:list-item;background-color:#fff280;width:100%;padding-left:3vw;padding-top:.31rem;padding-bottom:.31rem;font-size:.8rem;font-style:italic}.fil-ariadna ul{display:contents;padding-left:.5em}.fil-ariadna ul li{display:inline-block}}@media (min-width:992px){.fil-ariadna{font-size:1rem}}@media (min-width:1200px){.fil-ariadna{font-size:1.5rem}}header{background-color:#009cb1;color:#000;flex-direction:column}.container-header-1,header{display:flex;align-items:center}.container-header-1{width:100%;                  /*  !!! molt important */flex-direction:column-reverse}.logo{width:15vw;margin-top:.5rem;margin-bottom:.5rem}@media (min-width:576px){.container-header-1{max-width:540px;width:100%;        /*  !!! molt important */display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;align-items:flex-start}.logo{width:10vw}}@media (min-width:768px){.container-header-1{max-width:720px;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;align-items:flex-start}.logo{width:8vw}}@media (min-width:992px){.container-header-1{max-width:960px;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;align-items:flex-start}.logo{width:7vw}}@media (min-width:1200px){.container-header-1{max-width:1500px;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;align-items:flex-start}.logo{width:6vw}}.logo-petit img,.logo img{width:100%;height:auto}.container-header-2{text-align:center;width:100%;background:#bfe1f5;margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto;padding-top:.1rem;padding-bottom:.1rem}.logo-petit{width:5vw;margin:0 auto}nav ul{list-style:none}nav ul li:first-child{padding-left:0}nav ul li:last-child{padding-right:0}nav ul li a.active{border-bottom:2px solid #000}.idioma ul li{display:inline-block;padding:.06rem;font-size:.9rem}@media (min-width:768px){.idioma ul li{font-size:1.5rem}}nav.menu-principal ul li{padding:0;margin:0;font-size:.9rem;border:1px solid #fffbd4}nav.menu-principal ul li:first-child{border-top:2px solid #fffbd4}nav.menu-principal ul li:last-child{border-bottom:2px solid #fffbd4}@media (min-width:768px){nav.menu-principal ul li{display:inline-block;padding:.9rem;font-size:1.5rem;border:none}nav.menu-principal ul li:first-child{border-top:none}nav.menu-principal ul li:last-child{border-bottom:none}}footer{width:100%;padding:20px 40px;background:#009cb1;color:#000;text-align:center}footer ul{list-style:none}footer p{font-size:.8rem}.text-en-dotted{border-bottom:1px dotted #000}.adreca-empresa{display:block;font-weight:700;margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:30px}.xarxes-socials-icon{display:inline-block;background-color:#0d6da5;padding:10px;border-radius:30px;-webkit-border-radius:30px;-moz-border-radius:30px;-ms-border-radius:30px;-o-border-radius:30px}.container-footer-menu{font-size:1.3rem}.container-footer-menu,.credits{display:block;margin-top:20px}.credits a,.credits li{color:#fffbd4}.autor{display:block;font-size:.7rem;margin-top:20px;margin-bottom:30px;text-align:center;font-weight:700}section{overflow:auto}.portada-contenidor{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin-bottom:1em;padding-top:20px}@media (min-width:768px){.portada-contenidor{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;align-items:flex-start}}.portada-contenidor-text{width:100%;margin-bottom:1.25rem}.portada-contenidor-foto{width:100%}@media (min-width:768px){.portada-contenidor-text{width:70%;margin-right:3.12rem}.portada-contenidor-foto{width:30%;height:auto;padding-left:3vw;border:2px solid #ff0}}
